text: ‹ Tala liloba oyo Yawe, Nzambe ya Isalaele, alobi : Nakomi pene ya kosala ete bibundeli oyo ezali kati na maboko na bino, oyo bozali kosalela mpo na kobundisa mokonzi ya Babiloni mpe bato ya Chalide oyo bazingeli bino na libanda ya engumba, ebalukela bino ; mpe nakosangisa bango kati na engumba oyo.
